products.title: XL Steel
products.description:
Steel figures have a rough texture similar to cast iron.

Miniatures are 30mm scale on a 1-inch base: the most common scale for tabletop miniatures.

Orders in this material typically ship in about three weeks.

products.title: Rose Gold Limited Edition
products.description:
Limited Edition Rose Gold figures are cast in bronze and then plated in rose gold, giving them a pale pink color. This material will be available through the end of February.

Miniatures are 30mm scale on a 1-inch base: the most common scale for tabletop miniatures.

Orders in this material typically ship in about two weeks.

products.title: XXL Rose Gold Limited Edition
products.description:
Limited Edition Rose Gold figures are cast in bronze and then plated in rose gold, giving them a pale pink color. This material will be available through the end of February.

XXL miniatures are 30mm scale on a 2-inch x 1-inch base: the most common scale for tabletop miniatures.

Orders in this material typically ship in about two weeks.

products.title: XL Download
products.description:
Digital 3D model files are distributed in zipped .stl format with a typical file size between 5-10mb.

Miniatures are 30mm scale on a 1-inch base: the most common scale for tabletop miniatures.

Typical Delivery Speed: Purchased models will typically appear in your user profile page within 15 minutes, but please allow for up to one business day.

products.title: XL Bronze
products.description:
Bronze figures are a rich gold color and have a smooth finish.

Miniatures are 30mm scale on a 1-inch base: the most common scale for tabletop miniatures.

As a precautionary response to Covid-19, the facility that produces our Bronze material has been temporarily closed. As a result, this material will be unavailable until further notice. In the meantime, please consider trying one of our other material options.

products.title: XL Premium Plastic*
products.description:
*Due to business closures related to Covid-19 precautions, we have temporarily replaced our premium plastic material with an alternative, comparable material. This material is still printed at 50 micron layer thickness, the same as our typical Premium Plastic. Unlike our typical Premium Plastic, this option comes pre-primed in a matte black.

Premium plastic figures are matte black and have some faint layer lines. They have similar durability to regular plastic, but are manufactured with 50 micron layer resolution--double that of our base plastic material. Recommended for best painted results. Miniatures are 30mm scale on a 1-inch base: the most common scale for tabletop miniatures.

Orders in this material typically ship in about three weeks.

products.title: XL Plastic
products.description:
Plastic figures are primed with gray primer and have some layer lines. They are manufactured with 100 micron layer resolution.

Miniatures are 30mm scale on a 1-inch base: the most common scale for tabletop miniatures.

Orders in this material typically ship in about three weeks.

products.title: XL Rose Gold Limited Edition

XXL miniatures are 30mm scale on a 2-inch x 1-inch base: the most common scale for tabletop miniatures.

Orders in this material typically ship in about two weeks.

products.title: Pre-Order XXL Painted Plastic
products.description:
Painted Plastic figures are a 3D printed plastic material which has been hand-painted based on your saved color design. They have similar durability to our other plastic options.

Miniatures are 30mm scale on a 1-inch base: the most common scale for tabletop miniatures.

Pre-orders coming soon! This material will only be accessible to Kickstarter Backers. Orders placed in this material may take several months to be fulfilled while we build capacity!
